text: The 1903–04 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Art, Science and Industry during the 1903–04 men's basketball season. The Blue and Gold, who played without a head coach, played their home games at Main Building. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Regular season |- ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Drexel Drexel
title: 1903–04 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team
